docs.lead_paragraph: Wendy Davis has revealed her own deeply personal abortion story, writing in a memoir that goes on sale this week that she ended two pregnancies in the 1990s for medical reasons.

headline.main: Texas Candidate Reveals Personal Tale of Two Abortions
headline.print_headline: Texas Candidate Reveals Personal Tale of Two Abortions

docs.abstract: Revelation by Wendy Davis, Democratic candidate for governor of Texas, that she had two abortions for medical reasons in 1990s has rallied state's Democrats to her campaign; Democrats and Republicans differ on whether Davis's memoir Forgetting to be Afraid detailing her experiences will sway results of election.
docs.snippet: Wendy Davis has revealed her own deeply personal abortion story, writing in a memoir that goes on sale this week that she ended two pregnancies in the 1990s for medical reasons.

docs.lead_paragraph: The nation's respite from troublesome health care inflation is ending, the government said Wednesday in a report that renews a crucial budget challenge for lawmakers, taxpayers, businesses and patients.

headline.main: Pace of Health Care Spending Likely to Speed Up
headline.print_headline: Pace of Health Care Spending Likely to Speed Up

docs.snippet: The nation's respite from troublesome health care inflation is ending, the government said Wednesday in a report that renews a crucial budget challenge for lawmakers, taxpayers, businesses and patients.
